channel.title: How to change Mod, Admin, and Owner crowns
channel.description: How do you change Mod, Admin, and Owner crowns? I can't find it in Spirts file

item.title: How to change Mod, Admin, and Owner crowns
item.dc:creator: @rawr_i_am_scary rawr i am scary
item.description:
@rawr_i_am_scary wrote:

Run it, then click file, load cache, go into your client and double click cache. Click okay. It might take a while (a minute or two)

Read full topic

item.title: How to change Mod, Admin, and Owner crowns
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

rawr i am scary:

Use Tom’s Cache Suite and load the cache, they should be under media and under mod crowns

So how do I use it?

item.title: How to change Mod, Admin, and Owner crowns
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

[quote=“lord_fear, post:2, topic:347862”]They should be in there,
But try opening up “Class30_Sub1_Sub1_Sub1” and looking though what the sprites are called
Find something that might say “Admincrown” or something around that area,
If found, Go to your client files - Ctrl + F and search the name
You should find it and you should be able to edit.
Goodluck.[/quote]

There’s no Class30_Sub1_Sub1_Sub1.

rawr i am scary:

Use Tom’s Cache Suite and load the cache, they should be under media and under mod crowns

Where do I get that? Couldn’t find on google.

Read full topic
item.source: How to change Mod, Admin, and Owner crowns

item.title: How to change Mod, Admin, and Owner crowns
item.dc:creator: @lord_fear lord_fear
item.description:
@lord_fear wrote:

They should be in there,
But try opening up “Class30_Sub1_Sub1_Sub1” and looking though what the sprites are called
Find something that might say “Admincrown” or something around that area,
If found, Go to your client files - Ctrl + F and search the name
You should find it and you should be able to edit.
Goodluck.

Read full topic
item.source: How to change Mod, Admin, and Owner crowns
